summary: The Theives Guild has decided to increase their revenue by dealing skooma. Skooma also has some new... addictive effects.
descriptionHtml:
The Theives Guild has decided to increase their revenue by dealing skooma. Skooma also has some new... addictive effects. The fences in Riften and Whiterun both sell skooma. 

Effects: 
Fully restore health, magicka, and stamina. 
Slow Time and Berserk for 60 seconds. 
After Slow Time and Berserk wear off, %150 speed for 60 seconds. 
Drain all of your magicka for 24 hours. 
Withdrawal: 
Lose .5 health per second per bottle of skooma for 24 hours. 

I have also added \"Skoomadone\" to help addicts kick the habit. Skoomadone increases your health by 500 for 24 hours, but makes you %1000 weaker to all types of magic for 24 hours, so a non addict shouldn\'t use it. 

Also, don\'t use Carriages while going through withdrawal because you will die when you arrive at your destination. I highly reccomend this mod for people who still want to use carraiges: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15094 

Plans for the future: 
Make more addicts and dealers in the streets 
Add skooma pipes 
Add a \"Skooma Anonymous\" group 
Add \"softer drugs\" i.e. Skooma is to heroin as the planned drug is to weed. 

This mod will consume your Skyrim characters life, so you should make a separate \"addict\" save file. Good Luck!
author: IronPlatypus
